description:
Designed to be your daily companion, the Terminus XR is a compact folder that excels at everyday tasks. The classic clip-point profile makes this knife a versatile tool. A grippy G10 handle and deep jimping help give you a solid grip. The deep carry pocket clip tucks your knife safely away for unobtrusive carry.

  • Tough D2 tool steel blade is highly wear resistant and takes a keen edge
  • XR locking mechanism is easy to use and automatically adjusts over the knife’s lifespan
  • Flipper opening mechanism and dual thumb stud can be opened left or right handed
  • Deep-carry pocket clip is reversible and tucks your knife out of the way
  • Unsharpened false edge paired with the clip-point blade has a classic Bowie feel
  • Flipper acts as a compact guard
  • Deep jimping provides a natural anchor point for your thumb
  • Durable G10 handle provides a secure grip in all conditions
name: SOG Terminus XR G10
